casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David Franklin HURT. No. 192A04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 9, 2006. Lisa Bradley Dawson, Robert C. Montgomery, Assistant Attorney Generals, James C. Gaither, Jr., District Attorney, for State. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Hurt.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of October *2222006 by Attorney General to Strike Argument II of Defendant's Supplemental Brief:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of October 2006."
